sources.title: The KGB Connections (1981)
sources.description: Documentary - This 1982 film explains the KGB infiltration of America. Who they are, what they are doing, and how well they have infiltrated North America. -  Harold Brown, Nikita Khrushchev, V.I. Lenin Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/the-kgb-connections-1981/

metadata.Plot: Documentary about the KGB and the nefarious doings in its battle with the Soviet Union.
metadata.Actors: Harold Brown, Nikita Khrushchev, Vladimir Lenin
